hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Water Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: When ASM is used to code a randomizer they should call it ASMR.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Forest Temple#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Ice Cavern#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Farore's Wind#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Bow#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #0# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Water Temple Small Key#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #1# major item.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #Volvagia#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ Bomb Bag Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a chest and a crate in locked basements# in the Water Temple hold...^ #the Megaton Hammer# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple MQ Boss Key Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Bow#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #Morpha#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #the Water Temple Boss Key#.

ToT (Left).text: I bet you'd like to have more bombs.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #the Spooky Mask#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.
